text: "Wrong Again" is a 1998 song by country singer Martina McBride and is the fourth single from her fourth studio album Evolution. It went to number 36 in the United States, number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 5 on the Canadian Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Country songs Category:Martina McBride songs
title: Wrong Again (song)
